required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: DBPR108 Tablets in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial of DBPR108 Tablets for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluate DRBP108 in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus. The patients were randomly allocated to four groups: 50 mg, 100 mg, 200 mg and placebo group.

detailed_description.textblock: This study was to evaluate DRBP108 in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus. A total of 268 subjects were randomly allocated to four treatment arms: 50 mg, 100 mg, 200 mg or placebo group, in a 1:1:1:1 ratio.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Changes in HbA1c compared to baseline at week 12

secondary_outcome.description: Changes in HbA1c compared to baseline at week 8, week 4
Changes in Fasting plasma glucose compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12
Changes in 2-hour postprandial plasma glucose compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12
Changes in fasting glucagon compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12
Changes in fasting Insulin compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12
Changes in active（GLP-1）compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: The percentage of HbA1c≤6.5% or HbA1c≤7%
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of HbA1c≤6.5% or HbA1c≤7% at week 12
Changes in body weight（Kg）compared to baseline at week 4,week 8, week 12

arm_group.description: Participants received one 50mg of DBPR108 tablet and two placebos matching DBPR108 100mg under fasted conditions for one day.
Participants received one 100mg of DBPR108 tablet and two placebos matching DBPR108 50mg and 100mg under fasted conditions for one day.
Participants received two 100mg of DBPR108 tablets and one placebo matching DBPR108 50mg under fasted conditions for one day.
Participants received two placebo matching DBPR108 100mg and one placebo matching DBPR108 50mg

intervention.intervention_name: DBPR108 tablet(50mg), Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg)
intervention.description: One DBPR108 tablet(50mg) administered orally once a day + Two Placebos matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg) administered orally once a day for 12 weeks

intervention.intervention_name: DBPR108 tablet(100mg), Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg), Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg)
intervention.description: One DBPR108 tablet(100mg) administered orally once a day + One Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg) administered orally once a day + One Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg) administered orally once a day for 12 weeks

intervention.intervention_name: DBPR108 tablet(100mg), Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg)
intervention.description: Two DBPR108 tablets(100mg) administered orally once a day + One Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg) administered orally once a day for 12 weeks

intervention.intervention_name: Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg), Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg)
intervention.description: Two Placebos matching DBPR108 tablet(100mg) administered orally once a day + One Placebo matching DBPR108 tablet(50mg) administered orally once a day for 12 weeks
